channel.title: Watch out from hackers
channel.description:
Lately my friend [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,636148.0.html]created a topic[/url] in moparisthebest.com forums in server help section and unfortunately one guy asked him for permission to access to his computer by using Teamviewer program, This hacker went to his visa account and he tried to buy stuff from the internet, and he kept messaging my friend in TV chat program that he got hacked somehow, Fortunately my friend just shut down his computer and the internet and the hacker asked him back to use the teamviewer again, to buy what he were trying to, My friends found out that the hacker was trying to buy a website that costs around 80$ for 5 years
The hacker username in moparscape is: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=567860]lil_smok3r[/url] Please be careful before you give any access to someone that you don't know.
Thanks for reading!

item.title: Watch out from hackers
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Even though there is no solid proof per-se it seems pretty obvious that smok3r did something wrong, to me anyways. What I suggest is what Tom said though, don’t ever allow someone you’ve never met to remote into your computer.

I still think smoker is seriously in the wrong though, credit card theft is a felony even if all he did was try and purchase something online with it…

Read full topic

item.title: Watch out from hackers
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The solution to such dilemmas is actually quite simple: Fix your own problems using common sense and communication rather than having some random guy from an internet forum do it for you. You took the lazy option, and in doing so you allowed a person you didn’t know onto your machine. You’ve been unable to post anything constructive in regards to your accusations, so this topic has become nothing more than an entertainment venue.

If you ever have anything serious to say on the matter (as in PROOF) then go ahead and PM me. Let us be clear, though, I don’t take what your friend says as proof. If you ever want anyone to understand the situation you need to start talking sense, your above post just makes my head spin.

Read full topic

item.title: Watch out from hackers
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

Read this bloody post. I was joking around, didjn’t think it’d be this serious.

I thing Naseem answered you about this.
Naseem’s reply: ‘‘You was joking around? By trying to buy stuff from his visa? Do you call this a joke?’’

Anyway, let me know what there in system32 ? let me know why you went to there? you was active my domain on my
forum.
So what system32 can help you to active it ?

Btw , you said i will stop him i’m good hacker?

omfg ? i was dueling with a hacker? ROFL.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“hatem, post:58, topic:517917”]And let me know why i get hacked while you was teamviewering me ?

Any idea ?

EDIT: anyway i’ll face you soon :([/quote]You can’t even prove you were hacked! What exactly happened, when you were hacked? Saying you were hacked means nothing, because nothing happened. As far as I can tell, your computer and virtual goods are perfectly fine.

item.title: Watch out from hackers
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“hatem, post:53, topic:517917”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=636179.msg4289213#msg4289213 date=1366921630]
Just a random thought - can somebody do an IP check on hatem and Naseem? They talk very similarly and are very likeminded. Also, neither can really provide sufficient proof, a chat log that is posted in the manner they did can easily be faked and is not sufficient enough.

Also calling bs that the police are getting involved, considering there is little proof to begin with. And there isn’t even any information about your computer in System32… its just process files from what I can tell (somebody who is knowledgeable, correct me if I’m wrong).
[/quote]
What about that?

[13:17:32] BennCoder: ro
[13:17:33] BennCoder: get him
[13:17:40] ω╚»๖ۣۜνıρᴇʀ вʀσ™«╝ω: Wait
[13:17:48] BennCoder: oo
[13:17:49] BennCoder: bro

[13:17:50] BennCoder: i love you
[13:17:50] BennCoder: <3
[13:17:53] ω╚»๖ۣۜνıρᴇʀ вʀσ™«╝ω: Delete him
[13:17:56] BennCoder: ok
[13:17:57] ω╚»๖ۣۜνıρᴇʀ вʀσ™«╝ω: and he won’t be able to get ur ip
[13:18:07] ω╚»๖ۣۜνıρᴇʀ вʀσ™«╝ω: Ok now go to tools
[13:18:16] ω╚»๖ۣۜνıρᴇʀ вʀσ™«╝ω: and click options
[13:18:27] ω╚»๖ۣۜνıρᴇʀ вʀσ™«╝ω: Wait
